title: Oklahoma State
content:
![OkState](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106064737im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/9074.gif)   
The closest thing I've found is Megahertz Italic.
author: graficartist

comments.content: Thank you for your help. I love the fact that I can always rely on these forums for the best effort. If I can't find it and the ID gurus here can't nail it down then I can assume it's custom artwork. Thanks again for your help.

[Letterheadfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106064737/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/) has [Convecta](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106064737/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/letterheadfonts/convecta.shtml) and [Quantum](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106064737/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/uncommonlygood/quantum.shtml),   
but unfortunately no matches.
